characterDescription:
Aslydin, daughter of one of the Terris elders on Scadrial, fell in love with Demoux (or Thinker on Roshar) for his honor and his respectability, and he began to reciprocate.
Even as their world neared its end, she and Demoux were able to find love.
She is a member of the Seventeenth Shard and has her own interests throughout the cosmere.
